description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen for the manager's locations and time slots in a meal ordering platform. It contains one main widget class, `ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen`, which builds the user interface including an app bar, header, and placeholder sections for location and time slot management. Auxiliary private widgets `_SectionHeader` and `_Row` are used for UI components.

classes.name: ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the manager's locations and time slots screen with a scaffold, app bar, and placeholder content.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A private stateless widget that displays the header section with a gradient background and icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private stateless widget that displays a row with an icon and text, styled with box shadow and padding.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for `ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen`, including app bar and body with list of sections.

methods.name: _SectionHeader.build
methods.description: Constructs the header UI with gradient background, icon, and title text.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Constructs a row with an icon and text, styled with shadow and padding.
